Headline: The Voice Behind a New Generation of Video Games
Article_Body: From Aloy in “Horizon Zero Dawn” to Tiny Tina in “Borderlands 2” to Parvati Holcomb from “The Outer Worlds,” Ashly Burch voices characters in some of today’s most popular video games. It’s a dream job for the lifelong gamer. Burch was only 12 when she decided she wanted to do video game voice work. A few years later, she and her brother Anthony created and starred in the web series “Hey Ash, Whatcha Playin’?” Burch tells us how she broke into the industry as a voice-over artist and shows off her skills on the mic.
